headline: Private Markets: Why Retail Investors Should Stay Away

headline: Blackstone Energy Transition Partners Announces $1.2 Billion Investment to Build First-ever Natural Gas Power Generation Facility in West Virginia
summary: NEW YORK, November 13, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX), through funds affiliated with Blackstone Energy Transition Partners (collectively, "Blackstone Energy Transition Partners"), today announced a $1.2 billion investment to build Wolf Summit Energy ("Wolf Summit"), a fully contracted, 600-megawatt greenfield combined-cycle gas turbine ("CCGT") power generation facility in Harrison County, West Virginia.
